thread.title: Titans add wide receiver Rico Richardson to active roster, waive tight end Chase Coffman
thread.title_full: Titans add wide receiver Rico Richardson to active roster, waive tight end Chase Coffman

title: Titans add wide receiver Rico Richardson to active roster, waive tight end Chase Coffman
text:
Titans add wide receiver Rico Richardson to active roster, waive tight end Chase Coffman THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   3:21   3:21   
People: 
Football (1913) 
NASHVILLE, Tennessee â€” The Tennessee Titans have activated wide receiver Rico Richardson from their practice squad. 
The Titans waived tight end Chase Coffman to make room on the roster for the 6-foot-1 Richardson. 
Richardson, who is from Jackson State, will add depth to the Titans' receiving corps while Harry Douglas is sidelined with injured ribs. 
The Titans host the Atlanta Falcons on Sunday. 
Online: 
AP NFL websites: http://www.pro32.ap.org and http://www.twitter.com/AP_NFL
